name: Transport
description: Transport spendings including train, tolls, ships, parking, etc.

name: Income
description: Salary income, investment or credit interest, etc.

name: Utilities
description: Utilities like electricity bills, phone, etc.

name: Health
description: Health category includes dental and cirguries

name: General
description: General includes other spendings which no category has been defined

name: Entertainment
description: Entertainment as cinema, concerts, events, etc.

name: Personal Care
description: Personal Care like haircuts, manicure, etc.

name: Transfers
description: Transfers of money, buy/sell foreign money.

name: Travel
description: Travel including holidays, weekend trips, package holidays, etc.

name: Education
description: Education like school supplies, school private payments, etc.

name: Fees and Interest
description: Fees and Interest including bank account fees or credit card interest.
